==Trivia==
*Cempoa is likely based on {{w|Cempoala}} an important {{w|Mesoamerica|Mesoamerican}} historical site in the {{w|Mexico|Mexican}} state of {{w|Veracruz}}. Cempoala means "place of twenty waters" in {{w|Nahuatl}}.
